Keyboard Shortcuts:\n\t▲, ▼, ◀, ▶: Moves:
Keyboard Shortcuts:
	▲, ▼, ◀, ▶: Moves the cursor
	Enter: Selects next word
	Delete: Deletes the previous character
	⌦: Deletes the next character
	Spacebar: Selects next empty cell
	Tab: Toggles the selection direction
